title: What You’ll Receive
content:
You'll receive a high-resolution JPEG file (300 DPI) of this stunning artwork in a flexible 3:4 portrait ratio, providing a slightly broader vertical composition compared to the 2:3. With dimensions of 10800 x 14400 pixels (long edge at 14400px), this file ensures outstanding clarity and detail for large-format prints.

Maximum printable size at 300 DPI: You can create an impressive print up to 36 x 48 inches (91.4 x 121.9 cm) without any loss in quality.
instructions: This is the base text for the 'What You’ll Receive' section for the 3x4 aspect ratio. Edit the text to refine the message for this paragraph.
